author: Taako
name: YALC
install_msg: Thanks for installing YALC (Yet Another Logging Cog)! Use `[p]help YALC` or `/yalc` to get started. For full documentation, visit the repo.
description: üìù A powerful Discord server logging cog with customizable events, channels, and filters. Supports both classic and slash commands.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores guild-specific settings like log channels and event configurations. No personal user data is stored permanently.
